Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.Book

  • public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a Book.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Book

        public Book(java.lang.String ISBN,
            java.lang.String author,
            java.lang.String title,
            int releaseYear,
            int quantity,
            int available,
            int numOfBorrowings,
            boolean locked)
        Constructor for creating a new Book.
        Parameters:
        ISBN - The ISBN of the Book.
        author - The author of the Book.
        title - The title of the Book.
        releaseYear - The release year of the Book.
        quantity - The maximum number of this Book in the library.
        available - How many book is available in the library with this title (maximum quantity amount).
        numOfBorrowings - How many times has someone borrowed this Book.
        locked - Whether this Book is locked or not.
